attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Where I live is a place of natural beauty, rolling hills, old trees and miles of fields and farms, until recently the government insists that each town has a target of new houses to be built by the end of a certain amount of time which means old houses fields and woods are now being removed to make way for hideous estates. Save Britains beauty before its too late!
The government should be looking to build on already built up areas or buildings beyond repair rather than the countryside.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
